parameters.name: NumDatumTag
parameters.description: Total number of datum tags on the drawing view

title: IView.IGetDatumTags
description: Gets all the datum tags on this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumDatumTag
parameters.description: Total number of datum tags on the drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of datum tags VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of datum tags all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstDatumTag
and then repeatedly calling
IDatumTag::GetNext
to obtain the remaining datum tags on this drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetDatumTagCount
to get the value for numDatumTag.
